entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove Unnecessary Braces Refactoring #59628
  • ArgumentException from AnalyzerDriver #59626
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider #59624
  • Value tracking tool window needs more/better information #59621
  • When creating a new project, the dialog should suggest popular roslyn analyzers to include. #59620
  • Updating the C# LSIF tool to latest spec #59617
  • "Convert to switch statement" refactoring generates invalid code #59616
  • Suboptimal code for non-linear is-pattern expressions compared to switch #59615
  • Compiler perf improvements #59611
  • IDE0073 triggered when header template unspecified #59606
  • Interpolated raw string literals don't handle double braces correctly #59603
    17.2
  • Use synthesized wrapper methods for compiler-generated 'throw's #59601
    17.2
  • Secondary dashed line appears in raw string literals #59598

Closed

  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59262
    17.3
  • Mechanism to go-to overriden member declaration/definition #59619
  • WPF UserControl inheriting abstract class should have a quick action to implement it #59623
  • INamespaceOrTypeSymbol.GetTypeMembers does not return all type members. #59517
    17.2
  • Missing warning for incorrect parameter nullability on override that causes a NullReferenceException #48944
    17.1
  • Double-clicking error/warning coming from a source generated file the IDE should navigate to the location #50695
    17.2
  • No live analysis/intellisense diagnostics for source-generator outputs #50357
    17.2
  • Source Generators: Documents with generated content doesn't permit code fix execution #49533
    17.2
  • Diagnostic Analyzer Runner crashes when encountering invalid generic parameterless constructor pattern #59330
  • Enable unsafe code refactoring creates unnecessarily complex projects #44301
    Backlog
  • Parameter null checking compilation fails with parameter in async method #59614
  • inlined multiline raw string literal #59609
  • ToString format specifier completion for Guid shows DateTime specifiers instead #59453
    Backlog
  • char constant in Linq Queryable expression is converted to int #58886
  • Pattern matching null check should be eliminated if has been checked #59449
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in initializer wrapping with trailing comma #59629
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • Remove `NullableSyntaxAnnotationEx` #59618
    Area-IDE
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow exception local to be used in filter prologue in async methods #59608
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issue with curlies being innapropriately unescaped in raw string literals. #59607
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Cache parsed xml snippets for razor #59605
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • SyntaxWrappingOptions #59604
    Area-IDE
  • Review feedback from #59510 #59600
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59553
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove potential partial snapshot in codefixservice #59586
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move VisualStudioProject.BatchingDocumentCollection to it's own file #59589
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Delete directory in semantic-snippets feature branch #59571
    Area-IDE
  • Port more tests #59587
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59610
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow codefixservice to stream codefixes as it is computed, instead of waiting for all fixes to be ready. #59585
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix DateTime completion appearing innapropriately #59592
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Compute fixes by order of fixers, so we don't have to sort them after #59584
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59630
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Move GenerateOverridesOptions and BlockStructureOptions to global options #59508
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor indentation API #57529
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Do not remove parentheses from arithmetic ops in 'checked' contexts #59552
    Area-IDE
  • Print method name and hexadecimal offsets in ILVerify output #59583
    Area-Compilers
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Propagate CodeActionOptions through fix all #59575
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
